humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that the infiltrating ductal carcinoma measures 5.5 cm in maximum dimension and extends into the dermis (T4d). Therefore, the pathologic T stage of the patient's cancer is T4.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The T stage for breast cancer is determined by the size of the tumor and whether it has invaded the chest wall or skin. In this report, the tumor measures 5.5 cm in maximum dimension and has invaded the dermis (T4d), making the T stage T4.
